about_the_game:
Welcome LoLa!

LoLa’s Profile:

Age: 23
Height: 167 cm
Birth sign: Gemini
Hobbies: make her captain happy

LoLa has it all: she’s pretty, easygoing, chatty, and she’s just the right amount of crazy. Everywhere she goes, there are danger, adventure and infinite fun. With LoLa you’ll never get bored!

From now on, LoLa will become not only your dedicated companion, but your loyal bestie! LoLa will always keep you company on the main screen with her cute animations and exciting dialogs.

By purchasing this DLC, you get the LoLa mascot! You can switch your mascot at any time by opening your profile and choosing the "Mascot" tab.
Along with the mascot, you're getting 5000 credits and 150 super serum.
But most importantly, you're getting our undying gratitude! Thank you for considering purchasing this DLC!

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in the game are over 20 years old. The LoLa mascot wears full futuristic armor and can appear in suggestive poses.

name: Lust Goddess — Mascot LoLa
short_description: LoLa has it all: she’s pretty, easygoing, chatty, and she’s just the right amount of crazy. Everywhere she goes, there are danger, adventure and infinite fun. With LoLa you’ll never get bored!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
